mapper.select: select (select u.user_name from tb_user as u where u.user_no = rm.user_no) as user_name, (select u.user_no from tb_user as u where u.user_no = rm.user_no) as user_no, (select u.user_email from tb_user as u where u.user_no = rm.user_no) as user_email, (select h.connect_time from tb_history as h where h.user_no = rm.user_no and h.act_code = #{actCode}) as last_connet_time, (select c.code_info from tb_code as c where c.code_no = rm.room_auth_code) as auth_info from tb_room_member as rm where room_no = #{roomNo} and room_auth_code != #{roomAuthCode} and room_connect_code != #{roomConnectCode}
mapper.update: update tb_room_member set room_auth_code = case when room_auth_code = 'bb01' then 'bb02' when room_auth_code = 'bb02' then 'bb01' end where user_no =#{userNo} and room_no = #{roomNo}
